history.message:
Hi Patricia,

Thank you for your interest in The Decadent Review. We have received your submission and look forward to reviewing it.

Thanks!
-The Decadent Review

Dear Patricia,

While I could not agree more with the message of your poem (and let me add: "Easier for a Camel to Go Through the Eye of a Needle"), the verse is not entirely what we're looking for. I invite you to send us other pieces.

All strength to you, with absolute respect and unconditional love, your human brother.

Dimitri Kaufman.


The Decadent Review.
